name: ifpid

body.origin:
|- wb(wif(w0, w1, w1), w1)
-| wi(w0, wb(wif(w0, w1, w1), w1))
-| wi(wn(w0), wb(wif(w0, w1, w1), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wif(w0, w1, w1), w1)
-| wi(w0, wb(wif(w0, w1, w1), w1))
-| wi(wn(w0), wb(wif(w0, w1, w1), w1))

|- wb(wif(w0, w1, w1), w1)
-| wi(wn(w0), wb(wif(w0, w1, w1), w1))

comment: Value of the conditional operator for propositions when the same proposition is returned in either case. Analogue for propositions of ~ ifid . This is essentially ~ pm4.42 . (Contributed by BJ, 20-Sep-2019.)
